Title: 37587 - # Tips for Choosing the Best Mobile Protection Plan
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 tips for choosing the best mobile protection plan. You can talk about things like the amount of coverage you need, and picking the right company to purchase a plan from. Your target audience is interested in information about things like smartphones, apps, and social media so keep this in mind when writing. You can link to your target URL in a section that mentions checking the reviews on companies before choosing to purchase a plan through them.
